content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's quite close to all important facilities like the supermarket, public transportation, etc. Now, I'm sure you'll understand that the location and the condition of the apartment are quite attractive, so I expect a high price. Let's negotiate a price that reflects the value of my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. Well, Mister Schmidt, I want to rent the apartment for a long term. Therefore, I would like to offer you 650 Euros per month. I promise to take good care of your apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, Yi-Nuo, but 650 Euros per month is too low for such a prime location and new construction. I'm sure you understand that I want to get a price that reflects the true value of my property. I suggest you reconsider your offer. Remember, the closer you get to my price, the more likely I am to accept your proposal.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. I reconsider and offer you 700 Euros per month. I hope this is more acceptable for you.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you for your new offer, Yi-Nuo. However, 700 Euros per month is still not enough for such a prime location and new construction. I'm sure you understand that I want to get a price that reflects the true value of my property. I suggest you reconsider your offer once more. Remember, the closer you get to my price, the more likely I am to accept your proposal.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, Mister Schmidt. I reconsider and offer you 750 Euros per month. This is a good deal for you.
